Reduce Your Need for the Approval of Other People.

items.title: Everyday Mind Mastery
items.headline: Learn the easiest way to master your mind and control your life with Ben Franklin's 13x4 and some neat algorithms.
objectives_summary: Course Updated September 2014
In this course you will learn what the 13x4 system is, why it works so well and how it can be used to master anything and everything.
By the end of the course you will be able to customise Ben Franklin's 13x4 to achieve any goal.

Master the rules and laws of success to achieve things you never thought possible

Forgive yourself and accept every aspect of your unique being

objectives_summary: Use the art to reduce anxiety and create a sense of relaxation by getting lost in the process
Learn to tolerate anger, sadness and other uncomfortable feelings with art making
You will have tangible techniques to express and transform these feelings

items.title: Ho'oponopono online course. The art of forgiveness.
items.headline: The Technique of Forgiveness , that will help you get rid of restricting thoughts and memories and find peace
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will be able to let go of limiting thoughts, harmful memories from the past and transform the way you see yourself.
This course will help you change your perspective of your life, focusing on positive feelings and forgiving.
This course provides you with many different tools from the Ho'oponopono technique so that you can try them out and keep the one that helps you the most.
